T02vamvuppu:751: subahūny api vijñāya vañcanāni mṛter iha /
T02vamvuppu:752: ananuṣṭhānād viṣṭhābhir liptvā śayyāṃ mṛtā vayam // VMv_4.94 //
T02vamvuppu:754: ananuṣṭhānadoṣeṇa dantān niṣkāśya te mṛtāḥ // VMv_4.95 //
T02vamvuppu:756: adya śvo vā kariṣyāma iti cintāparā mṛtāḥ // VMv_4.96 //
T02vamvuppu:757: idaṃ kartāsmi śvaḥ punar idam idaṃ cāsya parato vṛthā prāptāśvāso vimṛśati na lolāṃ bhavagatim
T02vamvuppu:758: agatvā kāryāntaṃ viṣaya-salilāvartapatitā prajā mṛtyor vaktraṃ
T02vamvuppu:760: iti nigaditam etad vañcanaṃ mṛtyuśatroḥ svaparasamayasiddhadhyānakarmaprasādhyam /
T02vamvuppu:761: aghṛṇamaraṇabhīter yatnataḥ saṃvidheyaṃ yata iha kamanīyaṃ jīvitān nānyad asti // VMv_4.98
T02vamvuppu:767: āptam ataḥ kuśalaṃ yad amṛtyus tena jano 'stu sa mṛtyuvimuktaḥ //
T02vamvuppu:770: || iti śrīpaṇḍitācāryavāgīśvarakīrtiviracite mṛtyuvañcanopadeśe caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ
